title: Esempio
excerpt: Introduzione a Flex, un tema per Jekyll
content:
Introduzione a Flex, un tema per Jekyll

Flex è un tema minimalista e veloce, basato sul sito web The Development.

Disponibile come Open Source su GitHub

Flex è disponibile come Open Source ed è rilasciato sotto la licenza MIT License. Puoi contribuire al suo sviluppo!

title: Bloocks! Il generatore di siti statici, prelancio
excerpt: Bloocks! un generatore di siti web statici in fase di sviluppo! Ciao, sono Antonio e sto creando un generatore di siti web statici, si chiama Bloocks !, che combina le ultime tecnologie di sviluppo frontend, per massimizzare la velocità di sviluppo e ottenere un sito web statico con prestazioni fantastiche in linea con le esigenze di mercato inerenti alle prestazioni e scalabilità.
content:
Bloocks! un generatore di siti web statici in fase di sviluppo! Ciao, sono Antonio e sto creando un generatore di siti web statici, si chiama Bloocks !, che combina le ultime tecnologie di sviluppo frontend, per massimizzare la velocità di sviluppo e ottenere un sito web statico con prestazioni fantastiche in linea con le esigenze di mercato inerenti alle prestazioni e scalabilità.

Bloocks! ti permetterà di sviluppare il tuo block frontend, utilizzando un motore di template con blocchi grafici precostruiti pronti all’uso, in questo modo Bloocks! ti darà la possibilità di prototipare e testare velocemente idee di business e campagne di marketing direttamente sul web disponendo già di uno strumento base efficiente e funzionale, senza spendere un centesimo in sviluppo frontend e hosting, e quindi, a tuo piacimento, sviluppare un backend adeguato al tuo idea imprenditoriale, ma sapendo già, grazie al lancio di campagne di marketing, se la tua idea imprenditoriale avrà successo.

Sì, perché Bloocks! è strutturato per essere ospitato su servizi di hosting di prossima generazione, come Netlify, Github Pages e avrà anche integrazioni che gli permetteranno di essere ospitato su reti P2P distribuite utilizzando la tecnologia Blockchain ei suoi protocolli all’avanguardia; inoltre può essere ospitato su piattaforme di hosting classiche.

Bloocks! sfrutta le potenzialità della CDN per servire immagini, caricare script e fogli di stile, caricati dinamicamente, in modo che non sovraccarichino il server in cui è ospitato, ma sfruttino tutte le potenzialità e tecnologie di terze parti che consentono lo sviluppo di un sito web veramente performante , a livello di prezzo di entrata.

Bloocks! utilizza Tailwind CSS per elaborare i fogli di stile, questo gli permette, grazie alla tecnologia Tailwind CSS, di generare solo i fogli di stile strettamente necessari al progetto e quindi di avere il CSS perfettamente minimizzato; anche grazie all’integrazione con Tailwind CSS, sviluppa con Bloocks! ti permetterà di utilizzare solo ed esclusivamente classi HTML per generare i tuoi template grafici, senza mettere mano al codice CSS.

Il codice sviluppato con Bloocks! in fase di produzione è completamente minimizzato dal generatore statico, quindi alla fine del lavoro si avrà un progetto web già completamente minimizzato

Bloocks! is composed by:


  A static web page generator
  An ecommerce that uses Snipchart as an engine
  A blog in AMP to maximize SEO performance
  A portfolio to have a showroom of works
  Customizable posting areas
  Marketing tools such as modal popups, email marketing forms
  Google Analytics
  Google ADSense
  Coockie consent already integrated


Technologies used to create Bloocks!:


  Babel
  NodeJS
  Gulp
  Tailwind CSS
  AMP
  Jekyll
  Browsersync
  Autoprefixer


Future integrations planned:


  PostCSS
  Rucksack, PostCSS plugin
  cypress


Bloocks! it is still under development, and does not have a precise release date, try to understand, I am alone in developing this project and I do not have the resources to be able to plan when it will be completely ready, if you are interested in collaborating on the project contact me!

Bloocks! will be available with a free license for personal use and with various packages for professional use, you can still create your site, ecommerce, portfolio or test marketing campaigns for your ideas, but if you want to resell the projects you develop to third parties you will have to buy a license.

See you soon from Antonio.

title: The bloocks store ready to go
Contact the Bloocks team
content:
{% capture contacthead %} 
{% include bloocks/components/paragraph.html
  content=’Have some question? Have some advice? Do you wanna say Hello? Fill the form below, will be glad to know who you are!’
  style=’-webkit-text-stroke: 1px black; text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #FFF, -1px -1px 0 #FFF, 1px -1px 0 #FFF, -1px 1px 0 #FFF, 1px 1px 0 #FFF;’
%} 
{% endcapture %}
{% 
  include bloocks/hero/custom/full-img-smart.html
  title=’Contact Bloocks team’
  titletype=’h1’
  contentclass=’z-20’
  content=contacthead
  image=’img/contact/message-sent.svg’
  imgalt=’contact bloocks team’
  imgposition=’right’
  separator=’postline’
  separatorclass=’2xl:-mt-32 xl:-mt-32 lg:-mt-32 md:-mt-24 sm:-mt-20 -mt-14’
  seprgb=’rgb(212, 214, 218)’
%}

{% 
  include bloocks/forms/map-form.html
%}
{% include partials/subscribe-base.html %}

title: The bloocks store ready to go
Bloocks static website generator Blog
titles.mans-store
content:
{% assign store = site.translations[site.lang].store-ui %}
    {% for product in site.translations[site.lang].products %}
    {% if product["gender"] == 'man' or product["gender"] == 'unisex' %}

    {% comment %}{% include store/product-styles.html product=product %}{% endcomment %}
    {% include bloocks/store/store-card.html
      product=product
    %}
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    
  

{% capture fulltextcta %}
{{ site.baseurl_root }}

  {%
    include bloocks/components/button.html
    id='test'
    content='Button 1'
    href='/'
    target='blank'
    icon='heroicons/outline/puzzle'
    animation='ping'
    iconclass='flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 text-grey-100'
  %}
  {%
    include bloocks/components/button.html
    type='linkaltbutton'
    content='Button 2'
    otherclass='ml-4'
    href='/roadmap'
    target='blank'
  %}

{% endcapture %}
{%
  include bloocks/hero/tailblocks/full-text.html
  bloock=’full-text-blackbg’
  title=site.baseurl_root
  titlecolor=’text-gray-200’
  content=fulltextcta
  image=’what-inside/ecommerce-tools.svg’
  separator=’scrape’
  sepcolor=’7185a6’
  sepseccolor=’55647d’
  seprgb=’rgb(255,255,255)’
%}
<!–


      
      
      
      
  

</button>




    Buy now



  Add to cart


Quantity
</input>
Frame color

  Black
  Brown
  Gold


  Add to cart

–>

title: plans
Bloocks roadmap
content:
{% capture headcta %}
{% include bloocks/components/paragraph.html
  content=’Bloocks is under heavy development. We will lauch soon for free under MIT licence.’
  style=’-webkit-text-stroke: 1px black; text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #FFF, -1px -1px 0 #FFF, 1px -1px 0 #FFF, -1px 1px 0 #FFF, 1px 1px 0 #FFF;’
%}

  {% include bloocks/components/button.html
    content='Discover when'
    href='#subscribe'
    icon='heroicons/outline/arrow-down'
    animation='ping'
    iconclass='flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 text-grey-100'
  %}

{% endcapture %}
{% 
  include bloocks/hero/custom/full-img-smart.html
  title=’Bloocks is in prelaunch’
  titletype=’h1’
  contentclass=’z-20’
  content=headcta
  topbackground=’bg-gradient-to-b from-white to-gray-100’
  image=’img/roadmap/bloocks-launch.svg’
  imgotherclass=’pb-4 sm:pb-0 md:pb-0 md:pt-7 lg:pb-0 lg:pt-0 xl:pb-0 xl:pt-0 2xl:pb-0 2xl:pt-0’
  imgalt=’Bloocks pre-launch rocket image’
  separator=’scrape’
  sepcolor=’7185a6’
  sepseccolor=’55647d’
  seprgb=’rgb(0,0,0)’
  separatorclass=’2xl:-mt-48 xl:-mt-40 lg:-mt-32 md:-mt-24 sm:-mt-20 -mt-14’
  sepclass=’-mb-1’
%}
{% capture fulltextcta %}
To know when will be possible to create blazing fast static websites, you need to push the below button. We will update you via email when Bloocks will be avaible.


  {% include bloocks/components/button.html
    content='Receice updates!'
    otherclass='animate__animated animate__pulse animate__infinite'
    href='/subscribe'
    target='blank'
    icon='heroicons/outline/puzzle'
    animation='ping'
    iconclass='flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 text-grey-100'
  %}

{% endcapture %}
{% 
  include bloocks/hero/tailblocks/full-text.html
  bloock=’full-text-blackbg’
  id=’subscribe’
  title=’Build Unlawful quality Websites in no Time, for Free.’
  titlecolor=’text-gray-200’
  content=fulltextcta
  image=’img/what-inside/ecommerce-tools.svg’
  separator=’scrape’ 
  sepcolor=’7185a6’ 
  sepseccolor=’55647d’
  seprgb=’rgb(255,255,255)’
  sepclass=’-mb-2’
%}
{% capture bottomcta %}
{% include bloocks/components/paragraph.html
  content=’Whit Bloocks you will be able to build, quickest as possible, hight quality websites, usefull to start run business tests on the battlefield. Whithout spend money in hosting, optimization or developing stuffs.’
%}

  {% include bloocks/components/button.html
    content='Discover when'
    href='#subscribe'
    icon='heroicons/outline/arrow-up'
    animation='ping'
    iconclass='flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 text-grey-100'
  %}

{% endcapture %}
{% 
  include bloocks/hero/tailblocks/img-left.html 
  bloock=’big-img-left’
  title=’Test your idea on first!’
  titletype=’h1’
  titlehtml=’h2’
  content=bottomcta
  image=’img/roadmap/bloocks-test.svg’
  imgalt=’subscribe to bloocks email list’
%}

title: Subcribe to bloocks and discover how use it
Bloocks terms and conditions
content:
Bloocks terms and conditions.
            
            The privacy of my visitors is extremely important.

                This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information that is received and collected and how it is used.
            First and foremost, I will never share your email address or any other personal information to anyone without your direct consent.

        
	






    
        
            User data encrypted
        The privacy of my visitors is extremely important.

        This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information that is received and collected and how it is used.

        First and foremost, I will never share your email address or any other personal information to anyone without your direct consent.
    

    
        
            Log Files
        Like many other websites, this site uses log files to help learn about when, from where, and how often traffic flows to this site. The information in these log files include:

        
        
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                Internet Protocol addresses (IP)
            
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                Types of browser
            
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                Internet Service Provider (ISP)
            
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                Date and time stamp
            
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                Referring and exit pages
            
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                Number of clicks
            
        
        
        All of this information is not linked to anything that is personally identifiable.
    

    
        
            Cookies & Beacons
        When you visit this site “convenience” cookies are stored on your computer when you submit a comment to help you log in faster to Twitter the next time you do a tweet.
        
            
        
        Third-party advertisers may also place and read cookies on your browser and/or use web beacons to collect information. This site has no access or control over these cookies. You should review the respective privacy policies on any and all third-party ad servers for more information regarding their practices and how to opt-out.
        If you wish to disable cookies, you may do so through your web browser options. Instructions for doing so can be found on the specific web browsers’ websites.
        

        
            Cookies in EU Law
        Like many other websites, this site uses log files to help learn about when, from where, and how often traffic flows to this site. The information in these log files include:

        
        
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                
                    Is the EU’s cookie law confusing you too?
                
            
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                
                    New EU cookie law (e-Privacy Directive)
                
            
            
                {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                
                    Cookies – Doing nothing isn’t the right answer
                
            
        
        
        
        

            
                Disabling Cookies
            If you would like to restrict the use of cookies you can control this in your Internet browser. Links to advice on how to do this for the most popular Internet browsers are provided below for convenience and will be available for the Internet browser of your choice either online or via the software help (normally available via key F1).

            
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                        Disabling cookies in Internet Explorer
                    
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                        Disabling cookies in Google Chrome
                    
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                        Disabling cookies in Mozilla Firefox
                    
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                        Disabling cookies in Apple Safari
                    
                
            
            
            
    

    
        
            Google Analytics
        The cookies in use to deliver Google Analytics service are described below.

        Returning, New Session, Time, Custom Variable Data, Source

        
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    __utma
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    __utmb
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    __utmc
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    __utmv
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    __utmz
                
            
        
        

            
                Analytics Cookie Types

            
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    __utma
                
            
            
            This cookie is used to determine new and returning visitors. It has an expiration time of 2 years. If the ga.js library is executed and no _utma cookie exists, this will be recorded as the users’ first visit and a _utma cookie will be set. If a _utma cookie is already in place, the expiration time is reset and the user is recorded as a return visitor.
            
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                        __utmb
                    
                
            
            This cookie is used to determine a new session. The cookie is set when the ga.js library executes and there is no _utmb cookie in place. It has an expiration time of 30 minutes, therefore if a user is inactive for a period longer than this, a new cookie will be set when the library executes and the interaction will be recorded as a new session.
            
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                        __utmz
                    
                
            
            This cookie is used to determine the traffic source, medium, campaign name and campaign term which delivered the user to your website. It is created when the javaScript library executes and expires after 6 months. This helps Google collect the data which can then help them to determine which traffic sources assist conversions within the multi-channel section of Analytics.
            
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                        __utmc
                    
                
            
            This Cookie waits 30 minutes, and then it expires. You see, __utmc has no way of knowing when a user closes their browser or leaves a website, so it waits 30 minutes for another pageview to happen, and if it doesn’t, it expires. And is used to store information, such as what time your current visit occurred, whether you have been to the site before, and what site referred you to the web page.
            From Stackoverflow: What does __utma mean?
            
            
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                        __utmv
                    
                
            
            This cookie is used for storing visitor-level custom variable data. It is created when the _setCustomVar method is used with a visitor level custom variable. Like the _utma cookie, this cookie expires after 2 years and is reset each time the user visits your site before the expiration of the cookie.
            Although each of these cookies has a set expiration time, each time the ga.js library is executed and the expiration time has not been met the cookie is updated, resetting the expiration date to its original value.
            These cookies contain no personally identifiable information but they will use your computer’s IP address to know from where in the world you are accessing the Internet.
            Google stores the information collected by these cookies on servers in the United States. Google may transfer this information to third-parties where required to do so by law, or where such third-parties process the information on Google’s behalf.

        
        
        Opt-out
        In order to provide website visitors with more choice on how data is collected by Google Analytics, Google has developed the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on. The add-on communicates with the Google Analytics JavaScript (ga.js) to stop data being sent to Google Analytics. The Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on does not affect usage of the website in any other way. A link to further information on the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on is provided below for your convenience.
        
        Opt Out Google tools
        For more information on the usage of cookies by Google Analytics please see the Google website. A link to the privacy advice for this product is provided below for your convenience.
    

    
        
            Privacy Google
        Google Analytics is a web analytics tool I use to help understand how visitors engage with this website. It reports website trends using cookies and web beacons without identifying individual visitors.

        You can read: Google Analytics Privacy Policy

    

    
        
            Google Adsense
        Google Adsense, a third party affiliate marketing network, uses cookies to help make sure I get a commission when you buy a product after clicking on a link or ad banner that takes you to the site of one of their merchants.

        You can read: Google Adsense Privacy Policy
    

    
        
            Donation Policy
        All Donations throught our external pay sites and or through our paypal buttons will not be refundable, as they are a donation to a free website designer, that has limited abilitys to do money transfers back to you. Thank You for your donations to bloocks.dev.
    

    
        
            Comment Policy
        We want you to feel at home when you post a comment on bloocks.dev. We want everyone to feel at home posting comments on bloocks.dev. We don’t know what your home is like, but we know how we expect people to behave when they visit ours. That’s why we reserve the right to delete comments and ban users as needed to keep the comment threads here civil and substantive.
        
        Don’t be a jerk
        Want to be the kind of commenter we’d love to bring home to Thanksgiving dinner? Here’s what we like to see in comments:

        
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Weigh in with smart, informed ideas that contribute further to the story.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Give us useful, constructive criticism. Spot a typo or an error? Let us know and we will correct it.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Demonstrate and share the intelligence, wisdom, and humor we know you possess.
                
            
        


        
            
                
                    <header @click="selectedItem === 1 ? selectedItem = 0 : selectedItem = 1" x-bind:class="{ 'bg-gray-300': selectedItem === 1 }" class="flex justify-between items-center p-5 pl-8 pr-8 cursor-pointer select-none">
                        
                            Read more
                        
                        
                            
                                
                            
                            
                                
                            
                        
                    </header>
                    
                        
                            
                                Don’t feed the trolls. You wouldn’t dive into a debate with our ill-informed, weird uncle Gary just for the heck of it. And you definitely wouldn’t feed him. (We told you he was weird.) Downvote and flag comments instead. Although we can’t be everywhere at once, here are some of the kinds of comments we’re going to do our best to curtail: Promoting your own brand, product, or blog. So you’ve got a climate change solution that will simultaneously solve world poverty. Great. Send it through our contact form, you Elon Musk, you. Impersonating authors or other commenters. We can’t believe we have to say this, but: Don’t do that. It’s weird. Comments that make it clear you didn’t read the article. Enraged that we didn’t mention X in a story about Y? Slow down, Speedy McFingerson. If you’d made it past paragraph two, you’d see a very well thought-out discussion of that X you hold so dear. Comments that are completely out of left field. Sometimes discussions veer off a bit, but are still related to the original subject. That is fine. Hijacking the conversation to promote off-topic commentary is not. Threats — no matter how vague — against the author or other commenters. Things can get heated. Before you casually mention your foe’s home address, think of your Mother Earth. (Bonus points if you never use the phrase “Mother Earth.”) Racism, sexism, homophobia, you get the drift. Call us the PC Police, fine, but don’t say we didn’t warn you when you get tased. **And by tased, we mean banned or deleted. bloocks.dev has not — and will not — ever own a taser, and even if we were to own a solar-charged taser, we’d be too scared to use it. Trolling. If you’re a climate denier just out for a good trolling and are not contributing meaningfully to the conversation, we’ll be pushing you back under the bridge
                            
                        
                    

								
            
						
							
								<header @click="selectedItem === 2 ? selectedItem = 0 : selectedItem = 2" x-bind:class="{ 'bg-gray-300': selectedItem === 2 }" class="flex justify-between items-center p-5 pl-8 pr-8 cursor-pointer select-none">
										
												Read more
										
										
												
														
												
												
														
												
										
								</header>
									
											
													
															Don’t feed the trolls. You wouldn’t dive into a debate with our ill-informed, weird uncle Gary just for the heck of it. And you definitely wouldn’t feed him. (We told you he was weird.) Downvote and flag comments instead. Although we can’t be everywhere at once, here are some of the kinds of comments we’re going to do our best to curtail: Promoting your own brand, product, or blog. So you’ve got a climate change solution that will simultaneously solve world poverty. Great. Send it through our contact form, you Elon Musk, you. Impersonating authors or other commenters. We can’t believe we have to say this, but: Don’t do that. It’s weird. Comments that make it clear you didn’t read the article. Enraged that we didn’t mention X in a story about Y? Slow down, Speedy McFingerson. If you’d made it past paragraph two, you’d see a very well thought-out discussion of that X you hold so dear. Comments that are completely out of left field. Sometimes discussions veer off a bit, but are still related to the original subject. That is fine. Hijacking the conversation to promote off-topic commentary is not. Threats — no matter how vague — against the author or other commenters. Things can get heated. Before you casually mention your foe’s home address, think of your Mother Earth. (Bonus points if you never use the phrase “Mother Earth.”) Racism, sexism, homophobia, you get the drift. Call us the PC Police, fine, but don’t say we didn’t warn you when you get tased. **And by tased, we mean banned or deleted. bloocks.dev has not — and will not — ever own a taser, and even if we were to own a solar-charged taser, we’d be too scared to use it. Trolling. If you’re a climate denier just out for a good trolling and are not contributing meaningfully to the conversation, we’ll be pushing you back under the bridge
													
											
									
							

						
        


    

    
        
            Purchases Policy
        Please review the below information to find answers to any of your questions regarding our policies.

        
        Shipping Services
        Fur provides the below shipping services. Actual delivery time frames may vary due to weather, service delays, holidays etc.

        Free Standard shipping is available for apparel only on orders that have an after-discount subtotal value of $1.00 or more. Domestic shipping to Hawaii, Alaska, or Puerto Rico or any other location outside the Continental United States may take longer than expected due to their locations.

        
        Standard Shipping (6-10 business days)
        
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Standard shipping is our least expensive option and has an average delivery window of 3-10 days depending on the final delivery location zip code. Tracking is available.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Final delivery is made by USPS.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Select Standard shipping for orders being shipped to a P.O. Box.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Standard shipping may take a few more days for locations like Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico or any orders shipped outside the United States. This service is available for APO, DPO and FPO addresses and non-contiguous U.S. states and territories.
                
            
        
        
        Express Shipping (2 Business Days)
        
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Express shipping is an expedited option that offers full door-to-door tracking.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Express shipping is an available shipping option throughout all 50 states.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Express shipping will arrive by 4:30PM to a business or 7:00PM to a residence.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    This service is not available for P.O. Boxes or APO, DPO and FPO addresses.
                
            
        

        
        Overnight (Next Business Day)
        
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Overnight is an expedited shipping option that offers full door-to-door tracking.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Overnight is an available shipping option throughout all 50 states.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    Overnight will arrive the next business day by 10:30 a.m. to most U.S. addresses; by noon, 4:30 p.m. or 5 p.m. in remote areas; by noon, 1:30 p.m. or 4:30 p.m. on Saturdays.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    This service is not available for P.O. Boxes or APO, DPO and FPO addresses.
                
            
        

        
        Return Policy
        In retail, a return is the process of a customer taking previously purchased merchandise back to the retailer, and in turn receiving a refund in the original form of payment, exchange for another item (identical or different), or a store credit.

        Many retailers will accept returns provided that the customer has a receipt as a proof of purchase, and that certain other conditions, which depend on the retailer's policies, are met. These may include the merchandise being in a certain condition (usually resellable if not defective), no more than a certain amount of time having passed since the purchase, and sometimes that identification be provided (though usually only if a receipt is not provided). In some cases, only exchanges or store credit are offered, again usually only without a receipt, or after an initial refund period has passed. Some retailers charge a restocking fee for non-defective returned merchandise, but typically only if the packaging has been opened.

        While retailers are not usually required to accept returns, laws in many places require retailers to post their return policy in a place where it would be visible to the customer prior to purchase.

        In certain countries, such as Australia, consumer rights dictate that under certain situations consumers have a right to demand a refund. These situations include sales that relied on false or misleading claims, defective goods, and undisclosed conditions of sale.

        There are various reasons why customers may wish to return merchandise. These include a change of one's mind (buyer's remorse), quality of the merchandise, personal dissatisfaction, or a mistaken purchase of the wrong product. For clothing or other sized items, it may be a lack of a correct fit. Sometimes, there may be a product recall in which the manufacturer has requested (or been ordered) that the merchandise be brought back to the store. Also, gift receipts are offered sometimes when an item is purchased for another person, and the recipient can exchange this item for another item of comparable value, or for store credit, often on a gift card.

        In certain countries, such as Australia, consumer rights dictate that under certain situations consumers have a right to demand a refund. These situations include sales that relied on false or misleading claims, defective goods, and undisclosed conditions of sale.

        Source: Wikipedia

    

    
        
            Disclosure Policy
        I make money on this website through affiliate programs. If you click an affiliate link or ad banner and buy the product, you help support this website because I’ll get a percentage of that sale.

        Antonio Trento and this bloocks.dev Website is a Affiliate for Amazon and Google Adsense.

        What this means for you:

        
            
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    I became an affiliate to earn revenue towards the costs of running and maintaining this website. Where I have direct control over which ads are served on this website I offer only products that are directly related to the topic of this website and products that a reader/subscriber would have a genuine interest in or need of.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    I do not and will not recommend a product just for the sake of making money.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    I do not let the compensation I receive influence the content, topics, posts, or opinions expressed on this website.
                
                
                    {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/solid/badge-check.html class="flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 pt-1 relative -ml-6 text-indigo-500" %}
                    I respect and value my readers too much to write anything other than my own genuine and objective opinions and advice.
                
            
        
        Just like this website, my Disclosure Policy is a work in progress. As the revenue streams evolve, so will this page.
    

    
        
            License
        All original content (e.g. articles, blog posts, illustrations, artwork, and photographs) available on donboulton.com is released under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License unless otherwise noted. Basically this means you are free to share, transmit, distribute, alter, transform, and build on my work just as long as you don’t use it for commercial purposes without my prior written consent.
    

    
        
            Attribution
        If you’re inclined to give credit — a link back to the source article attributed to this website is good enough for me. If you don’t want to attribute our content, hey that’s cool too. Just don’t go using our stuff and republishing it as your own.

title: Thanks for contacting Bloocks! The new static site generator
content:
{% capture contacthead %} 
{% include bloocks/components/paragraph.html
  content=’We will answer in some days at your email address!’
%} 
{% endcapture %}
{% 
  include bloocks/hero/tailblocks/img-right.html

  titletype=’h1’
  titlehtml=’h1’
  titledata-aos=’fade-down’

  image=’img/thank-you/thanks.svg’
  imgalt=’contact bloocks team’
  separator=’scrape’
  sepcolor=’7185a6’

  seprgb=’rgb(0,0,0)’

%}

{% capture fulltextcta %}
To know when will be possible to create blazing fast static websites, you need to push the below button. We will update you via email when Bloocks will be avaible.

title: Discover what inside Bloocks static website generator
content:
What's inside Bloocks.
            
            
              Bloocks is a set of different technologies integrated together to speed up the creation of high quality websites.
            
            
              By getting an effective and free starting point to start testing your business ideas in the battlefield.
            
                
        
	




    
        
            With what's tools Bloocks is made
        
            Bloocks is a hybrid generator of static websites, it has been assembled using a series of open source tools, which, assembled together, create a complete development structure to create websites.
        
    
    
        
            
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/outline/template.html class="relative w-12 h-12 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                    
                        Frontend tools
                        
                            Open source, frontend frameworks and libraries, that Bloocks use to render the generated web pages.
                        
                    
                
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/outline/code.html class="relative w-12 h-12 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                    
                        Dev tools
                        
                            Open source, developer backend tools, that bloocks use to build your website and make it production ready.
                        
                    
                
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/outline/cloud-upload.html class="relative w-12 h-12 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                    
                        Hosting
                        
                            Free and paid, secure and scalable cloud hosting services, where Bloocks people advice to host your web application.
                        
                    
                
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/outline/shopping-cart.html class="relative w-12 h-12 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                    
                        Ecommerce
                        
                            Bloocks can be used to host vary types of ecommerce for small business or influencer, made to be build on pure static website. Below the list of technologies and configuration possibility.
                        
                    
                
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/outline/beaker.html class="relative w-12 h-12 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                    
                        Integrations
                        
                            Bloocks have integrated some popular tools that usually is installed on websites.
                        
                    
                
                
                    
                        {% include bloocks/icons/heroicons/outline/sparkles.html class="relative w-12 h-12 text-indigo-500" %}
                    
                    
                        Other technologies
                        
                            More other tools will coming soon!
                        
                    
                
            
        
    




    
      
        
            Frontend tools
            
                Open source, frontend frameworks and libraries, that Bloocks use to render the generated web pages.
            
      
      
        
      
    




    
        
          
            
              
            
            
              CSS
              Tailwind CSS
              Build without leaving your HTML
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              JS/CSS
              AOS
              Animate On Scroll Library
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              CSS
              Animate CSS
              Just-add-water CSS animations
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              JAVASCRIPT
              Alpine JS
              Reactive and declarative nature of big frameworks at a much lower cost
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              SVG
              Heroicons
              Hand-crafted SVG icons
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              SVG
              Heropatterns
              Repeatable SVG background patterns
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              SVG
              Fontawesome
              Most popular icon set and toolkit
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              FRAMEWORK
              Bloocks
              Badass and fastest website generator
            
          
        
          

  

{% include partials/subscribe-base.html cta=”More front end tools will be avaible soon…” ctabtnlink=”/subscribe” ctabutton=”Get updates” extabutton=”Dicover the roadmap” extrabtnlink=”/roadmap” background=”bg-gray-100” %}


    
      
        
            Dev tools
            
               Open source, developer backend tools, that bloocks use to build your website and make it production ready.
            
      
      
        
      
    




    
        
          
            
              
            
            
              JAVASCRIPT
              NPM
              Take your JavaScript development up a notch
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              JAVASCRIPT
              Gulp
              Compose JavaScript into efficient build pipelines
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              JAVASCRIPT
              Browsersync
              Time-saving synchronised browser testing
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              CSS
              PostCSS
              A tool for transforming CSS with JavaScript
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              CSS
              Autoprefixer
              Add vendor prefixes to CSS rules
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              CSS
              CSSNano
              Deliver your website's styles, faster
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              CSS
              PurgeCSS
              Removes unused selectors from your CSS
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              RUBY
              Jekyll
              Bloocks is made up on Jekyll
            
          
        
          

  

{% include partials/subscribe-base.html cta=”More back end tools will be avaible soon…” ctabtnlink=”/subscribe” ctabutton=”Get updates” extabutton=”Dicover the roadmap” extrabtnlink=”/roadmap” background=”bg-gray-100” %}


    
      
        
            Hosting possibilities
            
                Free and paid, secure and scalable cloud hosting services, where Bloocks people advice to host your web application.
            
      
      
        
      
    




    
        
          
            
              
            
            
              STATIC
              Github Pages
              Hosted directly from your GitHub repository. Just edit, push, and your changes are live
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              STATIC
              Netlify
              Run projects at global scale; without servers, devops, or costly infrastructure
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              STATIC
              AWS
              Enterprice cloud hosting by Amazon
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              STATIC
              Firebase
              Build apps fast, without managing infrastructure
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              STATIC
              Vercel
              Best developer experience with an obsessive focus on end-user performance
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              STATIC
              Render
              Build and run all your apps and websites with free SSL, a global CDN
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              BLOCKCHAIN
              Fleek
              Build and integrate privacy, encryption, and p2p functionality into your sites
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              BLOCKCHAIN
              Textile
              Provides developers with a decentralized database, IPFS-based storage, content hosting
            
          
        
          

  

{% include partials/subscribe-base.html cta=”And all other classic hosting providers…” ctabtnlink=”/subscribe” ctabutton=”Get updates” extabutton=”Dicover the roadmap” extrabtnlink=”/roadmap” background=”bg-gray-100” %}


    
      
        
            Ecommerce tools
            
                Bloocks can be used to host vary types of ecommerce for small business or influencer, made to be build on pure static website. Below the list of technologies and configuration possibility.
            
      
      
        
      
    




    
        
          
            
              
            
            
              ECOMMERCE
              Snipcart
              Free ecommerce service for static websites
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              AFFILIATE
              Amazon affiliate
              Able to make an affiliate site with Amazon
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              DROPSHIPPING
              Printfull
              Integrated dropshipping site using Printfull service
            
          
        
          

  

{% include partials/subscribe-base.html cta=”More ecommerce integrationswill be avaible soon…” ctabtnlink=”/subscribe” ctabutton=”Get updates” extabutton=”Dicover the roadmap” extrabtnlink=”/roadmap” background=”bg-gray-100” %}


    
      
        
            Other usefull tools
            
                Bloocks have integrated some popular tools that usually is installed on websites.
            
      
      
        
      
    




    
        
          
            
              
            
            
              ANALYTICS
              Google Analytics
              Integration with Google Analytics
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              MARKETING
              Google tag manager
              Integration with Google tag manager
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
              MARKETING
              Build in tools
              Build in marketing tools like, fixed navbars, popups and more
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
                COOCKIES
                Osano
                Integrated free open source Osano cookie consent solution
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
                CDN
                CDN Compatible
                The possibility to serve images and files from free or paid CDN
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
                IMAGES
                Images oprimization
                On every build bloocks will serve a diffrent img size for diffrent devices
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
                EMAIL
                Form subscription
                Built in form subscription compatible with Sendinblue and Mailchimp
            
          
          
            
              
            
            
                FORM
                Form submission
                Integrated with formcake for using contact forms
            
          


        
          

  

{% include partials/subscribe-base.html cta=”More integrationswill be avaible soon…” ctabtnlink=”/subscribe” ctabutton=”Get updates” extabutton=”Dicover the roadmap” extrabtnlink=”/roadmap” background=”bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-100 to-white” %}

title: titles.womens-store
content:
{% assign store = site.translations[site.lang].store-ui %}
    {% for product in site.translations[site.lang].products %}
    {% if product["gender"] == 'women' or product["gender"] == 'unisex' %}

    {% comment %}{% include store/product-styles.html product=product %}{% endcomment %}
    {% include bloocks/store/store-card.html
      product=product
    %}
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    
  

{% capture fulltextcta %}
{{ site.baseurl_root }}

  {%
    include bloocks/components/button.html
    id='test'
    content='Button 1'
    href='/'
    target='blank'
    icon='heroicons/outline/puzzle'
    animation='ping'
    iconclass='flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6 text-grey-100'
  %}
  {%
    include bloocks/components/button.html
    type='linkaltbutton'
    content='Button 2'
    otherclass='ml-4'
    href='/roadmap'
    target='blank'
  %}

{% endcapture %}
{%
  include bloocks/hero/tailblocks/full-text.html
  bloock=’full-text-blackbg’
  title=site.baseurl_root
  titlecolor=’text-gray-200’
  content=fulltextcta
  image=’what-inside/ecommerce-tools.svg’
  separator=’scrape’
  sepcolor=’7185a6’
  sepseccolor=’55647d’
  seprgb=’rgb(255,255,255)’
%}

  Add to cart

</input>

  Gold

–>

title: Bloocks static website generator Blog
